name: goToBviaA
description: Start at home, go to point A, then to point B.

name: goToA
description: Go to the starting point, A

name: fromAtoB
description: Go from A to B, but there's a mountain in between...

name: hike
description: Hike over the mountain, only if you have hiking gear

name: goThroughTunnel
description: You don't have hiking gear; go through the tunnel
